.. _overview-page:

==========
 Overview
==========

What is IntervalArithmetic ?
----------------------------

IntervalArithmetic is a free and open source (*) interval arithmetic package for |Python|_.

How is IntervalArithmetic licensed ?
------------------------------------

IntervalArithmetic is licensed under the `GPLv3 <https://www.gnu.org/licenses/quick-guide-gplv3.en.html>`_.

Going further with IntervalArithmetic
-------------------------------------

The best way to know what you can do with IntervalArithmetic, and to learn it, is to look at the examples:

 * :ref:`IntervalArithmetic Reference Manual <reference-manual-page>`

Which platforms are supported by IntervalArithmetic ?
-----------------------------------------------------

IntervalArithmetic runs on Linux, Windows 64-bit and Mac OS X.

How to install IntervalArithmetic ?
-----------------------------------

The procedure to install IntervalArithmetic is described in the :ref:`Installation Manual <installation-page>`.

Which version of Python is required ?
-------------------------------------

IntervalArithmetic requires Python 3.
